Combat
Hit Points: 248 Armor Class: 35 (dexterity; trained) Class DC: Cleric: 52 (wisdom; trained)
Armor: None Shield: Wooden (+2 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 12) Weapons: Dagger (+26 1d4+4 P/S R10'); Spiked Gauntlet (+26 1d4+4 P); Staff (+26 1d4+4 B [2h d8])
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +80
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +4
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Incredible Initiative: +2 Initiative
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Incredible Improvisation: May add +4 to an untrained skill check 1/dy
Shield Block: Shield negates damage up to its hardness and absorbs half of remaining damage
Weapon Specialization: +2/+3/+4 HP damage with expert/master/legendary weapon proficiency
Save: Fortitude: +26 (constitution; trained); Reflex: +28 (dexterity; expert); Will: +31 (wisdom; master)
Save Notes:
Lightning Reflexes: Save Expert (Reflex)
Resolve: Save Master (Will)
Breath Control: +1 vs. inhaled threats/Success vs. inhaled threat is always a critical success
Fast Recovery: Regains 2x Hit Points and drained severity from rest/Successful Fortitude vs. ongoing disease or poison reduces stage by 2 (1 if virulent; 3 or 2 with critical success)
Resolve: Successes on Will saves are critical successes
Magic
Spell Slots: D0: 5; D10: 1; D1: 3; D2: 3; D3: 3; D4: 3; D5: 3; D6: 3; D7: 3; D8: 3; D9: 3 Attack: Divine: 5 Spell DC: Divine: 13

Cantrip Expansion: Knows two additional cantrips
Reach Spell: May extend spell range by 30'

Validation Errors:
